div.p: In this branch of the MEI website you will find information about the MEI Community. This includes information about ongoing projects from individual MEI community members that already use MEI in one or the other way. Additionally, you will find information about upcoming presentations, workshops and other events dealing with MEI. If you want get in touch with the MEI community members personally, those are the best opportunities. Finally, you will find information about getting support by the community.
